Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 19-193, see notes under ยง 47-2853.76a.

DC CODE ยง 47-2853.76b

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The Department of Consumer and Regulatory Affairs, through the Board of Barber and Cosmetology, shall regulate body artists to protect public health, safety, and welfare, and to ensure that persons engaged in the occupation have the specialized skills, education, and training required to perform the services offered by:
Establishing and imposing occupational licensing, registration requirements, and associated fee schedules; and
Establishing rules within 180 days of the effective date of this part.

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)

subchapter.text: Non-Health Related Occupations and Professions Licensure.
